verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord make me an instrument
An instrument of worship
I lift up my hands in Your Name
Lord make me an instrument
An instrument of worship
I lift up my hands in Your Name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord tune me your instrument
Your instrument of worship
I lift up my voice in Your Name
(repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord play now your instrument
Your instrument of worship
I lift up my song in Your Name
(repeat)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord play now a love song
A love song of worship
We lift up our voices in praise
(repeat)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord make us a symphony
A symphony of worship
We lift up our voice in Your name
(repeat)
